title: Swamp Thing
overview: Mutated by his own secret formula, Dr. Alec Holland becomes Swamp Thing -  a half human, half plant superhero who will stop at nothing to rescue government agent Alice Cable and defeat his evil arch nemesis Arcane... even if it costs him his life.
